sentences.en: Both the petitioner and respondent provide for the upkeep of the children.
sentences.cn: 离婚上诉方和被告方共同抚养子女。

sentences.en: Election officials have rigged up speakers to provide voters with music.
sentences.cn: 负责选举的官员们已经临时安了几个喇叭，让投票者可以同时享受音乐。

sentences.en: In the evening a log fire would provide cosiness.
sentences.cn: 晚上点起篝火会让人感到温暖舒适。

sentences.en: Legal Aid can often provide referral to other types of agencies.
sentences.cn: 法律援助机构通常可以帮助引荐到其他类型的机构去。

sentences.en: Light colours provide an effective backdrop for pictures or a mirror.
sentences.cn: 浅色是挂放图画或镜子很有效果的衬托。

sentences.en: More productive farmers have been able to provide cheaper food.
sentences.cn: 农民提高产量就能使食物更加便宜。

sentences.en: New ways to treat arthritis may provide an alternative to painkillers.
sentences.cn: 关节炎的新疗法可能是止痛药之外的另一种选择。

sentences.en: Poland provide the opposition for the Scots' last warm-up match at home.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰队在国内最后一场热身赛的对手是波兰队。

sentences.en: Science may be able to provide some explanations of paranormal phenomena.
sentences.cn: 科学也许能够解释某些超自然现象。

sentences.en: Tea and biscuits will be provided.
Thatched pavilions provide shady retreats for relaxing and reading in privacy.
sentences.cn: 茅草亭是独自放松和读书的阴凉清幽之所。

sentences.en: The deal is likely to provide a template for other agreements.
sentences.cn: 这个协议可能会成为其他协议的范例。

sentences.en: The least his hotel could do is provide a little privacy.
sentences.cn: 他的酒店至少应该提供一点隐私保护。

sentences.en: The terrain's high points provide a panoramic view of Los Angeles.
sentences.cn: 在这个地区的制高点能够看到洛杉矶的全景。

sentences.en: The treaty provides that, by the end of the century, the United States must have removed its bases.
sentences.cn: 这项条约规定，到本世纪末，美国必须撤走其基地。

sentences.en: These projects will provide vital links between companies and universities.
sentences.cn: 这些项目将会成为公司和大学之间至关重要的联系纽带。

sentences.en: Which adult in these children's lives will provide the nurturing they need?
sentences.cn: 这些孩子生活中的哪个成人会为他们提供所需的养育呢？

words.tran_cn: 规定；条款；准备；[经] 供应品

phrases.tran_cn: 供养，供给；规定；为…作准备

trans.tran_en: to give something to someone or make it available to them, because they need it or want it

trans.tran_cn: 提供， 供给； 规定
trans.tran_en: to give something to someone or make it available to them, because they need it or want it
